title: Reverse a String
description: Write a function to reverse a string without using `.reverse()`.

title: Missing Number
description: Find the missing number in the array: [1, 2, 3, 5].

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Print the first 10 numbers in the Fibonacci sequence.

title: Palindrome Check
description: Check if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Count Vowels
description: Count the number of vowels in a string.

title: Two Sum
description: Given an array, return indices of the two numbers that add up to a target.

title: Factorial
description: Write a function to return the factorial of a number using recursion.

title: Longest Word
description: Return the longest word in a sentence.

title: Sum of Digits
description: Write a function to sum all digits of a number.

title: Flatten Array
description: Flatten a nested array without using `.flat()`.
